import React from 'react'; import { CartItemsContext } from '../../components/context/cartContext'; import ProductQuanityBox from './../../components/ProductQuanity'; import '../styles/Checkout.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, }); function Checkout() { const { products, subTotal } = React.useContext(CartItemsContext); const testQuanity = (bar) => console.log(bar); let couponToggle = document.getElementById('coupon-form'); const handleActions = (boolean) => { couponToggle.dataset.expanded = !boolean; console.log(!boolean, boolean, couponToggle.dataset.expanded); }; return (

My Cart

{products.map(({ name, src, price, color, sku, quanity, key }) => (

{name}

{`$${price}`}

Color: {color}

{`${formatter.format(price * quanity)}`}

))}

Order Summary

Subtotal

{subTotal}

Shipping

Free

Oklahoma, United States

Total

{subTotal}
); } export default Checkout;
